p: Furthermore, MHC class I chain-related protein A (MICA) is a natural ligand of C-type lectin like activated receptor, which is mainly expressed in the human intestinal epithelium. Cellular stress such as parasitic infections and inflammation can upregulate the expression of MICA [ 3]. However, although we found that CLEC9A and other genes were upregulated in CE-R group, no evidence showed corresponding MHC natural ligand. This should be studied further.
